channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Man accused of killing UnitedHealthcare’s CEO shouts on way into courthouse and fights extradition
Judge blocks supermarket mega-merger
item.description: On Tuesday, a proposed mega-merger between two of America's largest supermarket chains was blocked in the courts. The deal would have seen Kroger acqu...

item.title: WATCH: Mom and kids sneak downstairs to see Santa leaving gifts under Christmas tree
item.description: Tyler Montemurro, a mom of five, started this tradition with her family in 2021 when her dad had the idea to dress up as Santa Claus.

item.title: Biden approves national security memo aimed at helping Trump on China, Iran, North Korea and Russia
item.description: President Joe Biden has approved a new national security memorandum that is meant to serve as a roadmap for the incoming Trump administration as it lo...

item.title: Albertsons gives up on Kroger merger, sues grocery chain for failing to secure deal
item.description: Albertsons is giving up on its merger with Kroger a day after it was rejected in two courts and it is suing the grocery chain, saying it didn’t do eno...

item.title: WATCH: Luigi Mangione’s lawyer talks legal fight after UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting
item.description: Thomas Dickey, the defense attorney for Mangione, who is accused of killing Brian Thompson, discusses his client’s refusal to waive extradition to New...

item.title: The Stock Market Is Doing Something It Has Done Only 2 Times Since 1985, and History Is Clear About What Happens Next
Trump appoints ambassadors Kimberly Guilfoyle and Tom Barrack, plus 5 more picks
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump posted a flurry of announcements on Tuesday, including Kimberly Guilfoyle as ambassador to Greece and Tom Barrack as amba...

item.title: Coast Guard rescues missing woman shouting for help in wilderness
item.description: A 64-year-old woman was rescued from an Oregon state park where she had been stranded for almost two full days, the U.S. Coast Guard said.

item.title: Hospitals gave patients meds during childbirth, then reported them for illicit drug use
CEO killing latest: Luigi Mangione is 'taking it as well as he can,' lawyer says
item.description: Luigi Mangione's defense attorney said he has seen "no evidence" linking his client to the killing, adding that "a lot of guns look the same."

item.title: Texas woman is 'freaking out' after husband lied about having a $1 million net worth — he's actually $150,000 in debt
Judge rejects bankruptcy sale of Alex Jones' Infowars to The Onion
item.description: The judge criticized the auction process as flawed and said the outcome "left a lot of money on the table" for Sandy Hook families.

item.title: Inflation remains sticky, with CPI rising 2.7% from a year ago
item.description: Inflation has cooled from its most recent peak, but progress in getting it to a 2% annual rate has been slow.

item.title: Alex Jones keeps Infowars for now after judge rejects The Onion’s winning auction bid
Make these 3 big gold investing moves before 2025, experts say
item.description: If you want to invest in gold by year's end, here's how (and how not) to do it, according to experts.

item.title: Millions Of People Take Biotin For Hair Growth, And Many Are Unaware Of This Dangerous Side Effect
Trump, GOP expected to undo Biden’s divisive nursing home rule
